folder: Richmond Terrace & Jewett Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, north side, west from Bodines Pond (west of Clove Road) to Jewett Avenue. Part of the sign, which is a fire-insurance advertisement, reads: "Mrs O'Dooley's Cow knocked over the lamp which started the Great Chicago Fire. Not the Cow's Fault."  

March 5, 1927  

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Jewett Avenue
